pr_title: DB-10759 Tell Spark where to find jars for user VTIs

timeline.bodyText: We should try to reduce direct dependencies on Spark in "core" modules such as db-engine.
timeline.author: dgomezferro

replies.bodyText: @dgomezferro OK, I converted this to class Object and moved Spark class and API references to the spark_sql module.
replies.author: msirek

timeline.message: DB-10759 Tell Spark where to find jars for user VTIs

timeline.bodyText: The implementation for all platforms is the same, it should be in spark_sql/src/main/java only once instead of copied in multiple platforms.
